response:
Subacute right-sided sensory level with a ‘band’ over the right chest, ipsilateral right-leg spastic weakness with brisk reflexes and extensor plantar, impaired vibration/JPS with positive Romberg, and contralateral pinprick loss indicate a right thoracic hemicord (Brown–Séquard) lesion. A separate right RAPD with reduced acuity localises to the right optic nerve.

lesion_locations = ["right thoracic spinal cord", "right optic nerve"]
